column5: You know those printed window covers you see on the back windows of pick ups,where would one get one?  Thanks

You know those printed window covers you see on the back windows of pick ups,where would one get one?  Thanks I would think that anyone with a wide format printer such as a company that does vehicle wraps Brian. They could pretty much print whatever you want. There are quite a few in Barrie..

I would think that anyone with a wide format printer such as a company that does vehicle wraps Brian. They could pretty much print whatever you want. There are quite a few in Barrie..  Thanks John. I was not sure. I know a place to try then. Can you see through them from inside ?  So if I have a picture,they should be able to make it?
Google vinyl wraps, most sign shops could help you with that. Yes you can see through them but your visibility is reduced.
this is what he wants the clear view prints  http://www.clearvuegraphics.com/fullsize.php?limit=15&category=8&product=13&size=20-65&From=standard
First he needs a truck,  just wouldn't look right across the back of a pontoon.

this is what he wants the clear view prints  http://www.clearvuegraphics.com/fullsize.php?limit=15&category=8&product=13&size=20-65&From=standard     Thanks dude. Thats sweet. I see they dont make it for an Avenger back window.

They can print pretty much anything Brian. Yes you can see through them but its like having a very dark tint it does reduce visability somewhat. Why not just get the whole vehicle wrapped....about $4500 would cover it....lol
Get a bunch of marshmellows and treble hooks on the back window, that would be awesome
Glasscapes is one manufacturer of them.  If you're looking for custom print, any vehicle wrap place as others have stated.
Get a bunch of marshmellows and treble hooks on the back window, that would be awesome  You first.  Thanks guys. I called a contact. Working on what I want.
